description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8eh6","text":"Protocol for detecting Rab7a phosphorylation at S72 by LRRK1 and LRRK1 mutants  in HEK 293T cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9i665","text":"Day - 1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48qoq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jbi4","text":"Split 293T cells in 6-well dishes   before transfection at 200K/well in   DMEM (with FBS and with P/S)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c3945","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"D09A1700D8AB11EDA03A8900594021FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"DECC6DA0D8AB11EDA03A8900594021FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dendu","text":"Day - 2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhn5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67bh2","text":"Transfection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr2lv","text":"Warm PEI and Opti-MEM at RT for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp4d6","text":"Label a tube for each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"B3AADD00D8AB11EDA03A8900594021FE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hbcg","text":"Add DNA ( of GFP-Rab7 +   of LRRK1 construct of interest) to   of Opti-MEM and gently vortex for 5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dc024","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"DA8F3C50D8AF11ED9D2F9DA4A0CD46E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"DE4AE4C0D8AF11ED9D2F9DA4A0CD46E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"E910EB70D8AF11ED9D2F9DA4A0CD46E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mqlh","text":"Add   room-temperature PEI to each tube containing Opti-MEM/DNA mix. Mix gently by pipetting and incubate DNA/DMEM/PEI mixture at room temperature in the hood for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":164,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":163,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bvlve","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"2DB58D30D8B011ED9D2F9DA4A0CD46E8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"47A47F80D8B011ED9D2F9DA4A0CD46E8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"694go","text":"In the meantime…remove media from 6-well dish containing cells and replace with fresh 1 mL DMEM (with FBS and withoutP/S)…put back in 37 deg incubator until ready to add transfection mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":110,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blal9","text":"After 15 min incubation, add DNA/Optimem/PEI mixture dropwise   onto each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4sfhg","text":"Give a bit of a light swirl before putting back in incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"44B0A900D8B211ED870A4D247D167C3F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11alg","text":"  after transfection, begin cell lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bs83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":129600,"guid":"4B849880D8B311ED870A4D247D167C3F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2flk1","text":"Wash plate on ice with cold PBS 1x","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4djnp","text":"Add  RIPA buffer (0.5% Triton, 50 mM Tris pH7.5, 150 mM NaCl, 0.1%SDS) with protease and phosphatase inhibitors (cOmplete mini EDTA free + PhosSTOP tablets)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"756r8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"911D3730D8B311ED870A4D247D167C3F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"clt23","text":"Lift with cell lifters on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m6k7","text":"Pipet up lysate, put in eppendorf tube, and shake 15 mins in the cold room","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8g8fj","text":"Spin at MAX at 4 deg for 15 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jvdd","text":"Remove supernatant and make sample (boil at  for  ), store in   . I like to store the lysate and take some out to make a sample –I use the 4x NuPage LDS sample buffer:   lysate +   10x Reducing Agent +  4x LDS buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":66,"length":150}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":168,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":179,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":202,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aomas","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8A87EC70D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"8FC5EF20D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"92FCB020D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"65","error":false,"guid":"AD9FFE50D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B1FB9040D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"A63557A0D8B411EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5k6l2","text":"SDS-PAGE with Bis-Tris gel and MOPS running buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cds1d","text":"Load a 4-12% Bis-Tris gel with   of prepared lysate in sample buffer and run at 180V for ~   or until dye front has reached the bottom of the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1gfe7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"E38A2650D8B711EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3000,"guid":"1D3BBDF0D8B811EDBBFCBB215D286770","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4m4lr","text":"Assemble gel with Immobilon-FL PVDF membrane for transfer according to instructions from your western blot transfer apparatus. When using fluorescence detection for Western blot it is important to use low fluorescence background membrane (Immobilon-FL or equivalent).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aogl9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4jbo","text":"We activate membrane with MeOH and rinse with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kjnf","text":"Transfer in Western transfer buffer with Tris/Glycine and 20% MeOH at 200 mA for 4 hr at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"643E76FFD8B811ED93A70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gfat","text":"After transfer is complete, rinse membrane with water and allow to dry between sheets of Whatman paper.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a18id","text":"Block in 5% milk in TBS (no Tween 20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d421","text":"Dilute primary antibody in 5% milk with TBST (with Tween 20)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"306g","text":"-rabbit anti Rab7 phospho-S72 (MJF-38) at 1:1000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5m3ev","text":"-mouse anti-GFP at 1:2500 (Santa Cruz) (for total Rab quantification) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ede1","text":"-rabbit anti-LRRK1 (ab228666) at 1:500 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eia1q","text":"-rabbit anti-GAPDH at 1:3000 (Cell signaling technologies) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f207t","text":"Rock   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3t1ls","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"1E1C0622D8BB11ED93A70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E1C06EAD8BB11ED93A70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
